body:
Hi Genevieve,


I don't know where you got these primary values, but CIE (x,y) 
primaries must each be between 0.0 and 1.0, and they cannot add up to 
greater than 1.0 when combined.  I suspect this is at least part of 
your problem.


-Greg
___
<sup>Automatically generated content from [radiance mailing-list](https://radiance-online.org/pipermail/radiance-general/2004-December/002247.html).</sup>
